note: Leftie; both politically and on the old guitar. Software development and occasional hot takes. Retro game dev (Spectrum Spectrum Next and MonoGame) and home music writing/recording as hobbies. C#, WPF, Delphi etc. Some Pico-8 releases. Father to a 13 year old who thinks she’s at least 18. Divorced once! Happily living in the countryside with my girlfriend & her teenage son, all rather too close to a volatile river in Cheshire.
